Forex Description: Trade on 60+ FX pairs including Majors, Minors and Exotics with your RightFX trading account and enjoy the lowest spreads in the region varying on our three different account types
Metals Description: With the ability to trade CFD’s on precious metals, you get to enjoy all the diversification and speculation benefits without having to physically own the precious metals.
Indices Description: Trade CFD’s on popular indices with your RightFX account and get access to the biggest global stock indices including NASDAQ, German DAX, and Dow Jones with low margin requirements and the tightest spreads.
Energies Description: Trade CFD’s on energies like oil and gas with you RightFX account is a great way to diversify your portfolio. We offer you access to those markets without having to purchase the product outright
CFDS Description: From Apple to Microsoft, Tesla to Facebook, Netflix to Amazon, and thousands of others – leveraged products on shares give everyone the chance to invest in the companies they are interested in.
